title: SGA Memory Distribution / SGA Bellek Dağılımı
description: Analyzes System Global Area (SGA) memory allocation and distribution across components to optimize memory usage

queries.sql: SELECT NAME, VALUE / 1048576 AS VALUE_MB FROM V$SGA WHERE NAME IN ('Database Buffers', 'Redo Buffers', 'Shared Pool', 'Large Pool')

doc_hint: Review SGA component sizes. Database Buffers should be 50-80% of SGA. Shared Pool should be 10-20%. Adjust if components seem undersized for workload.
analysis_prompt: Report SGA component sizes in MB. Calculate percentage breakdown. Recommend adjustments if distribution seems imbalanced for typical EBS workload.
